column4: hi, my "appearance preferences windows" isnt working after i installed emrad..
: yup, but i cant get my emerald working so i uninstalled it. however when i tried to load the appearance window it is not working anymore. i can't click on the buttons
do the buttons appear, or are they not there altogether
: they all appear, but i can't click any of them. they are disabled or something
it isnt working still, can i just uninstall it and install another one?
don't uninstall the metacity, just leave it and install another one to replace it
ok. iafter i did the gtk-window-decorator --replace..it is now broke even more
nope, still there but not all parts are present
what do you mean by that
all are disabled..the tab buttons on the top. so with the add, edit, and customize..
you may have to reboot after switching back to metacity
nothings changed. i still cant click anything on the appearance window
